attributes.title: Just really sad
attributes.review: Immediately upon downloading this app I received a text from Donald J. Trump himself, in which he simply stated that I was a stinky doodie head. My feelings were crushed, but what’s worse is that he later flew a helicopter over my house, landed, and came inside just to punt my baby to the next town over 😢. I have yet to find her, and it’s getting close to her nap time.

attributes.title: Trump is the worst 🙄🙄🙄🙄👎👎👎👎
attributes.review: The only reason I downloaded the app is because I was the TikTok is getting deleted from USA 🇺🇸 sooo TikTok is trying to get the app to a 1 star. You might be saying why 1 star? Because if we do get it to one star the there will be NO more of this app I’m reviewing. So if your from TikTok and u didn’t know it u happen to look at the app and don’t like trump help us ok bye 👋

attributes.title: Don’t support Cheeto 😌🤚🏽💗🧚‍♀️
attributes.review:
An absolutely awful app that Cheeto (trump)made because I almost got scammed for thinking that Cheeto is a good president “I was going to show my support “👁👄👁 he should NOT be president again because he’s disgusting and stupid. and is trying to make my life miserable by taking TikTok away from me and YES TIKTOK😔😭.  and also this app requires to much information:) 

-thank you.

attributes.title: So bad
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to make America great again but geez it’s bad it wouldn’t let me play Fortnite like what and then they we’re so much ads and in game purchases like bruh. Yea I don’t recommend this app to anyone is super bad took a month to download on the fastest WiFi speed and once it did download awful and it made my phone super laggy and glitchy

attributes.title: Terrible app
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to keep up with the Trump administration and while I was scrolling my dog started growling. I quickly realized the we had given our dog a chew toy of our loving president 🥰❤️ and now he wants to attack him every time he sees him. So I could use the app. The app also took forever to download and isn’t even useful I-. Bottom line is DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.title: Ya boi
attributes.review: It is actually appalling to see grown men and women so ignorant of what is right and wrong. It is quite the sight to see that the “older and more intelligent” generation slowly bring their country to war with each other over the fact that someone is different and not white. There is evidence of every disgusting thing Donald Trump has done and still, you chose to support him.

attributes.title: he stole my dog
attributes.review: i downloaded the app to see what all the fuss was about😔 then the next day😱 i woke up to see a fat bob the builder lookin man in my bedroom stealing my dog😡😭 🧚🏼‍♀️ i don’t how he did it😡 but now my dog is gone and ALSO now all the sudden my tv doesn’t work? COINCIDENCE I THINK NOT. the world deserves a better app than this.  also to trump if your reading this, i hope you stub your big toe 🥰

attributes.title: I didn’t like the app
attributes.review: It was so glitchy😡😡it took an hour to download and the only picture I saw was a Cheeto puff, oh wait that’s trump?! So sorry🙀🙀😭😭😭😥😥😥😓😓😓😓😱😱🙏🏻🙏🏻🙏🏻I didn’t mean to disrespect our wonderful president ✨ anyway, keep working on making America great again, you’ve been at it for four years and still no outcome, just a making it worse ✨

attributes.title: Doesn’t work, ruined my life
attributes.review: This app is the worst app I have ever made the mistake of downloading from the App Store. With all the dysfunction and security issues, I can’t believe it’s still on the App Store!! I know China has all my info now and it’s because of none other than Donald J. trump. This app is a disgrace to the world, and I will be deleting it straight after this

attributes.title: The worst possible outcome for the United States of America
attributes.review: Donald Trump is the absolute worst president in my or my parents life time. At no point would I ever, under any circumstances, EVER vote for this piece of human filth. Donald tax “breaks” nearly took my return. He’s racist, sexist, misogynistic, pig headed, soft brained, and all around a bad night human being let alone a government official. I would vote for a turkey sandwich before I vote him back in office.
